Articles.Content:
What is the worst or most difficult rocket or spaceplane you've tried to dock to a spacestation or another craft.

This was a pain to dock.

Made this for bouncing round the planet and high altitude contracts, its a sort of Concorde, wish i could fill the wings with fuel.

The spacestation i put in orbit by mounting the same wings and tail on it.

![CHdQVGn.png](http://i.imgur.com/CHdQVGn.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-25T03:13:06Z" title="06/25/2015 03:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 25, 2015</time> by Claw**

This:

![HyitoMb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/HyitoMb.jpg)

![layPp1d.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/layPp1d.jpg)

![c3CynwB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c3CynwB.jpg)

It turned sooo slow and took ages to translate. I had to crawl in to dock at like 0.2 m/s in fear of not being able to slow down in time if i went any faster. When i finally docked it, I realised it was not alined the way i wanted it so i had to undock it and rotate and then re-dock. 

It is a hanger bay for my Mun miner if you were wondering.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
